name: Reference to the DeviceMetric resource
display: Reference to the external Device Metric resource
publisher: Health Level Seven, Inc. - Health Care Devices (DEV) WG
description: This extension provides the facility to link the current Observation resource to the DeviceMetric resource from where the data is coming from.

element.formal: This extension provides the facility to link the current Observation resource to the DeviceMetric resource from where the data is coming from.
